subjectarea.name: org.infogrid.lid.model.lid
subjectarea.userdescription: The concepts defined by LID that aren't defined anywhere else.

entitytype.name: AuthenticationService
entitytype.userdescription: A Yadis Service that is able to authenticate a principal. More specific subclasses are provided for specific authentication protocols.

entitytype.name: WebAuthenticationService
entitytype.userdescription: An AuthenticationService that uses a standard web browser as the client device, and thus implements the redirect dance. More specific subclasses are provided for specific authentication protocols.

entitytype.name: LidGpgSso
entitytype.userdescription: This represents a LID GPG-based Authentication Service in any version.

entitytype.name: LidGpgSso2
entitytype.userdescription: An Authentication Service based on the LID GPG SSO service, version 2.

entitytype.name: RelyingPartyService
entitytype.userdescription: A Yadis Service that is able to accept authentication assertions. More specific subclasses are provided for specific protocols.

entitytype.name: LidGpgRelyingParty
entitytype.userdescription: This represents a LID GPG-based Relying Party Service in any version.

entitytype.name: LidGpgRelyingParty2
entitytype.userdescription: A LID GPG-based Relying Party Service based on the LID GPG SSO service, version 2.
